casebody.data:
State of Connecticut v. Roberto Vergara (13387)

Foti, Schaller and Hennessy, Js.

Argued December 2 decision released December 20, 1994 Suzanne Zitser, assistant public defender, for the appellant (defendant). Mary H. Lesser, assistant state’s attorney, with whom, on the brief, was Patricia A. Swords, state’s attorney, for the appellee (state). Per Curiam.

The judgment is affirmed.1

This appeal was taken originally to the Supreme Court. Pursuant to Practice Book § 4023, the Supreme Court transferred the appeal to this court.
